metadata.title: CVE-2017-17122 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The dump_relocs_in_section function in objdump.c in GNU Binutils 2.29.1 does not check for reloc count integer overflows, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (excessive memory allocation, or heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PE file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.32-8ubuntu1').
